verses.verse: And all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H5512><s%> after their journeys, <S%H4550><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Rephidim: <S%H7508><s%> and there was no <S%H369><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

Why the people <S%H5971><s%> did chide <S%H7378><s%> with Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> us water <S%H4325><s%> that we may drink. <S%H8354><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Why <S%H4100><s%> chide <S%H7378><s%> you with me? why <S%H4100><s%> do you tempt <S%H5254><s%> the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> thirsted <S%H6770><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> for water; <S%H4325><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that you have brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us and our children <S%H1121><s%> and our cattle <S%H4735><s%> with thirst? <S%H6772><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall I do <S%H6213><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> people? <S%H5971><s%> they be almost <S%H4592><s%> ready <S%H5750><s%> to stone <S%H5619><s%> me.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go <S%H5674><s%> on before <S%H6440><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> with you of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and your rod, <S%H4294><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> you smote <S%H5221><s%> the river, <S%H2975><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and go. <S%H1980><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you there <S%H8033><s%> on the rock <S%H6697><s%> in Horeb; <S%H2722><s%> and you shall smite <S%H5221><s%> the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and there shall come <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of it, that the people <S%H5971><s%> may drink. <S%H8354><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Massah, <S%H4532><s%> and Meribah, <S%H4809><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of the chiding <S%H7379><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and because <S%H5921><s%> they tempted <S%H5254><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Is the LORD <S%H3068><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us, or not?
Then came <S%H935><s%> Amalek, <S%H6002><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Rephidim. <S%H7508><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Choose <S%H977><s%> us out men, <S%H582><s%> and go <S%H3318><s%> out, fight <S%H3898><s%> with Amalek: <S%H6002><s%> to morrow <S%H4279><s%> I will stand <S%H5324><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill <S%H1389><s%> with the rod <S%H4294><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in my hand. <S%H3027><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> to him, and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Amalek: <S%H6002><s%> and Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and Hur <S%H2354><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill. <S%H1389><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> held <S%H7311><s%> up his hand, <S%H3027><s%> that Israel <S%H3478><s%> prevailed: <S%H1396><s%> and when <S%H834><s%> he let <S%H5117><s%> down <S%H5117><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%> prevailed. <S%H1396><s%>

But Moses <S%H4872><s%>hands <S%H3027><s%> were heavy; <S%H3515><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> a stone, <S%H68><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it under <S%H8478><s%> him, and he sat <S%H3427><s%> thereon; <S%H5921><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Hur <S%H2354><s%> stayed <S%H8551><s%> up his hands, <S%H3027><s%> the one <S%H2088><s%> on the one <S%H2088><s%> side, and the other <S%H259><s%> on the other <S%H2088><s%> side; and his hands <S%H3027><s%> were steady <S%H530><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the going <S%H935><s%> down <S%H935><s%> of the sun. <S%H8121><s%>
And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> discomfited <S%H2522><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%> and his people <S%H5971><s%> with the edge <S%H5310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> and rehearse <S%H7760><s%> it in the ears <S%H241><s%> of Joshua: <S%H3091><s%> for I will utterly put <S%H4229><s%> out the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of Amalek <S%H6002><s%> from under <S%H8478><s%> heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar, <S%H4196><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of it Jehovahnissi: <S%H3071><s%>

For he said, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H3027><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will have war <S%H4421><s%> with Amalek <S%H6002><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation. <S%H1755><s%>
